
                            
                            <p>最终是靠着手锯锯开的。先在旁边锯开个口子，然后掰开的。一共两层。合金那层没有拍照。外面是合金层，里面这一圈铜合金。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/07/121129ncncre8n0p8e6022.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/07/121129ncncre8n0p8e6022.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/07/121135gqz646n878e8dxwd.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/07/121135gqz646n878e8dxwd.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
